item.title: Arigato
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: arigato.ro is the first Wordpress theme developed by us. It is a simple modification of the Hemingway theme. Arigato was a music venture created by us -- we loved to make great great parties. During this project we have created a few eclectic & electronic flyers to promote arigato events.
item.excerpt:encoded: arigato.ro is the first Wordpress theme developed by us. It is a simple modification of the Hemingway theme.

item.title: Smuff — gadget & gizmo shop & blog
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
smuff.ro is the first gadget webshop in Romania. Moreover, it was the first webshop running on a blog engine. In the backend we had an osCommerce application handling the shopping, on the fronted we put a Wordpress blog for presentation and search engine optimisation. Smuff was a huge success: featured continuously in the local mass media, starting from TV shows, newspapers and awards. Our content was syndicated into many online and offline blogs and magazines. The first lesson we've learned with shopping is that the engine matters most. Having the most advanced publishing engine in the front we had no additional costs for PR and Marketing. The niche targeted by Smuff was also a big hit: premium gadgets and gifts, thinks you don't need but really really want. For us the combo of a niche on hype + the right tools turned to be a successful business.
Disclaimer: Shopledge is the founder and administrator of Smuff.
item.excerpt:encoded: smuff.ro is the first gadget webshop in Romania.

item.title: ceasuri-binare.ro
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A simple product presentation site with web2.0 design elements.
<!--more-->
And a simple logo designed by us.
item.excerpt:encoded: A simple product presentation site with web2.0 design elements.

item.title: Brandyou
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A simple logo and website concept for a company in the self-branding business.
<!--more-->The site was never went online but it worth the experience.
item.excerpt:encoded: A simple logo and website concept for a company in the self-branding business.

item.title: Apemin Tusnad
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
An important mineral water producer and retailer asked us to create an intranet application for managing their business processes.
<!--more-->It was rather a web development project than simple design, with more than 1 year duration.
However we have been enjoying also the design process. Please find attached a screenshot of the three main modules of the application created specially for business users.
item.excerpt:encoded: An important mineral water producer and retailer asked us to create an intranet application for managing their business processes.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: [...] during the Apemin Tusnad project it meant to be the design firm beside our other venture the Smuff [...]

item.title: Clairvoyance To Your Business
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: clair.ro is the older sister of Shopledge. Created during the Apemin Tusnad project it meant to be the design firm beside our other venture the Smuff webshop. With clair we've designed a couple of websites and learned to develop good webshops. So we've decided to switch definitively to webshop design & development, combining the knowledge of running a webshop with the ability to create a webshop.
item.excerpt:encoded: clair.ro is the older sister of Shopledge.

item.title: Sisteme Multitouch
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
It is a simple company presentation site with a blog.
<!--more-->We have used for the frontpage design the Cooliris application to visualize image search results in 3D.
The logo meant to express the enhanced media aspect of the multitouch systems.
item.excerpt:encoded: It is a simple company presentation page with a blog.

item.title: Garlando
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The online presence of Garlando Romania. Initially the customer wanted a webshop and later this feature was turned off. Still it was a nice exercise to analyse all available webshop and e-commerce plugins for Wordpress.
item.excerpt:encoded: The online presence of Garlando Romania.

item.title: Ski Baile Tusnad
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The info site for the ski resort at Baile Tusnad.We have also created the logo.
item.excerpt:encoded: The info site for the ski resort at Baile Tusnad.

item.title: The Tusnad Blog
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Baile Tusnad is a small holiday resort. We've created a blog for the local companies to share news and information about their businesses.
item.excerpt:encoded: A blog for the local companies to share news and information about their businesses.

item.title: Hoterkep Kft
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: A simple company presentation blog.

item.title: The Mushkat Webshop
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A fashion shop for women selling party and cocktail dresses.<!--more-->
We have also created a simple and elegant logo using only fonts and colors.
item.excerpt:encoded: A fashion shop for women selling party and cocktail dresses.

item.title: Kobi
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Kobi is a personal finance web service.
<!--more-->It tracks your expenses and incomes.
item.excerpt:encoded: Kobi is a personal finance web service.

item.title: The New Smuff
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The new optimized e-commerce engine for Smuff.<!--more-->We have kept the shop & blog combination of the old Smuff site but we have added a new shop frontpage instead of presenting products as blog posts. In other words we moved the Wordpress engine in the background.
osCommerce was also replaced by the WP-E-Commerce plugin which integrates seamlessly into Wordpress.
The new site boosted a monthly 20% in visits since launching due to Wordpress' built-in search engine optimization functions. Also the conversion rate had a significant growth by the new frontend presenting products in a more clear way.
item.excerpt:encoded: The new optimized e-commerce engine for Smuff.

item.title: The Equitana Webshop
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Yet another webshop running on the Smuff e-commerce engine.
<!--more-->The success of our new engine made our friends envy who ported their existing webshop into this new platform.
item.excerpt:encoded: Yet another webshop running on the Smuff e-commerce engine.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We know and we love the web. That’s why we are here. To offer your shop a powerful look, and, satisfaction for your customers. Yes, we are running our own webshop since 2006, and we we’ve created a few others for our friends too. We have also designed a couple of websites, crafted web applications and created visual identities. Over these years we’ve learned how to create and run a successful e-commerce business from all aspects. Shopledge was set up to made these best practices available for all — in form of blog posts, good advices, e-commerce templates and plugins.
item.excerpt:encoded: Best paractices from e-commerce experts distilled into usable products.

item.title: Basic Theme for Shopify, First Review
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Today we've finished the first theme for Shopify named Basic. First of all, as all themes designed by us, it has full mobile support for all devices. In fact it is using a technique called Responsive web design which natively supports all screen sizes.
item.excerpt:encoded: Today we've finished the first theme for Shopify named Basic.

item.title: Ready for Support
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The first and foremost support channel for Shopledge customers is Twitter. You can contact us anytime @shopledge, you are always welcome.
